players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. He was found dead today."
Diana: "I am not the Mafioso, I have no reason to kill Bob. Alice has confessed to being the Mafioso and we should believe her."
Charlie: "Bob, I think Diana is telling the truth and Alice is lying. We should lynch Alice."

Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)

players.name: Diana

Alice: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. He was found dead today."
You: "I am not the Mafioso, I have no reason to kill Bob. Alice has confessed to being the Mafioso and we should believe her."
Charlie: "Bob, I think Diana is telling the truth and Alice is lying. We should lynch Alice."
